utils.intan.load_intan_rhd_format module

read_rhd(filename)[source]

Reads Intan Technologies RHD2000 data file generated by evaluation board GUI.

Data are returned in a dictionary, for future extensibility.

plural(n)[source]

Utility function to optionally pluralize words based on the value of n.

Module contents

Package to read from Intan files (.rhd)

Downloaded from https://intantech.com/downloads.html?tabSelect=Software&yPos=0
